name: Moving On (Sergei Zemtsev)
description:
Igor and Sveta are orphans. The 90s rewarded them with nothing else but life in a two-story wooden barracks.

Finally, it is their turn to move out of emergency housing.

Joyful, at first glance, the news encourages the characters to look at their lives from the outside. The memories of the past have blurred over time, but they still hurt the heroes.

Help the guys to make the long-awaited move!

- Fully original story, graphics and soundtrack

- Full english and russian versions (switch language in preferences tab)
